name: Rob vs The Machines
description:
Rob vs The Machines is a 2D platformer where you help a team of friendly robots, each called Rob, to solve different puzzles in a factory filled with evil robots! But only one Rob can be active at a time. Will you be able to help them fulfill their quest?

Joystick Support : Native Xbox controller support (for other controllers, check the input tab in the setting window before opening the game. The necessary buttons are Jump and Power).

This game was made for the 7th Game Jam hosted in Santa Maria, RS - Brazil.

Made with Unity.
